UAKeychainUtils Class Reference

Inherits from NSObject
Declared in UAKeychainUtils.h

Overview

The UAKeychainUtils object provides an interface for keychain related methods.

Tasks

  • + createKeychainValueForUsername:withPassword:forIdentifier:
  • + deleteKeychainValue:
  • + updateKeychainValueForUsername:withPassword:forIdentifier:
  • + getPassword:
  • + getUsername:
  • + getDeviceID

Class Methods

createKeychainValueForUsername:withPassword:forIdentifier:

Creates a key chain.

+ (BOOL)createKeychainValueForUsername:(NSString *)username withPassword:(NSString *)password forIdentifier:(NSString *)identifier

Parameters

username

The username for the key chain.

password

The password for the key chain.

identifier

The identifier for the key chain.

Return Value

YES if the key chain was created successfully. NO otherwise.

Declared In

UAKeychainUtils.h

deleteKeychainValue:

Deletes a key chain.

+ (void)deleteKeychainValue:(NSString *)identifier

Parameters

identifier

The identifier to specify the key chain to be deleted.

Declared In

UAKeychainUtils.h

getDeviceID

Gets the device ID, creating or refreshing if necessary. Device IDs will be regenerated if a device change is detected (though UAUser IDs remain the same in that case).

+ (NSString *)getDeviceID

Return Value

The Urban Airship device ID or an empty string if an error occurred.

Declared In

UAKeychainUtils.h

getPassword:

Get the key chain’s password.

+ (NSString *)getPassword:(NSString *)identifier

Parameters

identifier

The identifier for the key chain.

Return Value

The password as an NSString or an empty string if an error occurred.

Declared In

UAKeychainUtils.h

getUsername:

Get the key chain’s username.

+ (NSString *)getUsername:(NSString *)identifier

Parameters

identifier

The identifier for the key chain.

Return Value

The username as an NSString or an empty string if an error occurred.

Declared In

UAKeychainUtils.h

updateKeychainValueForUsername:withPassword:forIdentifier:

Updates a key chain.

+ (BOOL)updateKeychainValueForUsername:(NSString *)username withPassword:(NSString *)password forIdentifier:(NSString *)identifier

Parameters

username

The username for the key chain.

password

The password for the key chain.

identifier

The identifier for the key chain.

Return Value

YES if the key chain was updated successfully. NO otherwise.

Declared In

UAKeychainUtils.h
